```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Packages
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(shiny)
library(flexdashboard)
library(ggplot2)
library(htmltools)

# Load data
players <- read_csv("Clean/Players_2023-24.csv")
east <- read_csv("Clean/East_2023-24.csv")
west <- read_csv("Clean/West_2023-24.csv")
```


Sidebar {.sidebar}
=======================================================================
```{r}
selectInput("teams",
            "SELECT A TEAM",
            choices = sort(unique(players$TEAM_NAME)),
            selected = "ATL")

selectInput("players",
            "SELECT A PLAYER",
            choices = NULL)

# Observe selection on Team input
observe({
  team_selected <- input$teams
    
  # Check if team_selected is NULL or empty, return early if it is
  if (is.null(team_selected) || team_selected == "") {
    return()
  }
  
  players_list <- players %>% 
    filter(TEAM_NAME == team_selected) %>% 
    select(PLAYER_NAME)
  
  players_list <-  sort(unique(players_list$PLAYER_NAME))
  
  # Update the Players based on the team selected,
  # setting the choices to the relevant subset from the players list
  updateSelectInput(session, 
                    "players",
                    label = "SELECT A PLAYER",
                    choices = players_list,
                    selected = players_list[1])
})

roster <- reactive({
  players %>% filter(TEAM_NAME == input$teams)
})

current <- reactive({
  players %>% filter(PLAYER_NAME == input$players)
})


renderImage({
  # Obtain the selected team name
  selected_team <- tolower(unique(roster()$TEAM_ABBREVIATION))
  
  list(src = paste0("www/logo-", selected_team, ".png"),
       contentType = "image/png",
       width = "auto",
       height = "auto")
  }, deleteFile = F)

create_stat_plot <- function(stat) {
  df <- reactive({
    roster() %>% 
      mutate(PlayerSelected = if_else(PLAYER_NAME == input$players, 
                                      "Selected", "Not Selected"),
             stats = .data[[stat]]) %>%
      arrange(desc(stats)) %>% 
      mutate(PLAYER_NAME = factor(PLAYER_NAME, levels = rev(unique(PLAYER_NAME))))
  })
  
  
  ggplot(df(), aes(x = PLAYER_NAME, y = stats, fill = PlayerSelected)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity", alpha = .6, width = .5, show.legend = F) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = c("Selected" = "#6F263D", "Not Selected" = "#1d428a")) +
    coord_flip() +
    labs(x = NULL, y = NULL) +
    theme_minimal() 
}

create_top_10 <- function(stat) {
  df <- reactive({
    players %>% 
      mutate(PlayerSelected = if_else(PLAYER_NAME == input$players, 
                                      "Selected", "Not Selected"),
             stats = .data[[stat]]
             ) %>%
      arrange(desc(stats)) %>% 
      mutate(PLAYER_NAME = factor(PLAYER_NAME, levels = rev(unique(PLAYER_NAME)))) %>% 
      slice_head(n = 10)
  })
  
  
  ggplot(df(), aes(x = PLAYER_NAME, y = stats, fill = PlayerSelected)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity", alpha = .6, width = .5, show.legend = F) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = c("Selected" = "#6F263D", "Not Selected" = "#1d428a")) +
    coord_flip() +
    labs(x = NULL, y = NULL) +
    theme_minimal() 
}

create_ranking <- function(conf) { 
  df <- reactive({
    conf %>% 
      mutate(TeamSelected = if_else(TEAM_NAME == input$teams,
                                    "Selected", "Not Selected")) %>%
      arrange(W_PCT) %>% 
      mutate(TEAM_NAME = factor(TEAM_NAME, levels = TEAM_NAME))
  })
  
  ggplot(df(), aes(x = TEAM_NAME, y = W_PCT, fill = TeamSelected)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity", alpha = .6, width = .5, show.legend = F) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = c("Selected" = "#6F263D", "Not Selected" = "#1d428a")) +
    coord_flip() +
    labs(x = NULL, y = "Win Percentage") +
    theme_minimal() 
}
```

})
